short_description: NEW LOOK, SAME RELIABLE HAIR CARE: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey and Yogurt Hydrate + Repair Multi-Action Leave-In Conditioner spray absorbs quickly to hydrate, recondition, strengthen, and smooth abused hair.
HAIR STRENGTHENING: Blended with Shea Butter, Manuka Honey, and Yogurt, the conditioning spray fortifies hair with strand-supporting proteins that form a natural protective layer.
LASTING MOISTURE FOR CURLY HAIR: Transforms brittle strands to hydrated, shinier, healthier-looking hair. Suitable for curly, wavy, and straight hair.
ANTI-FRIZZ HAIR PRODUCTS: This sulfate-free conditioner spray helps to prepare your locks for easy styling, as it protects brittle hair from heat and other styling damage.
THE SHEA MOISTURE DIFFERENCE: All SheaMoisture hair products are made with Fair Trade Shea Butter and contain no silicones, no sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no mineral oil, and no petrolatum.

name: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, 8 Ounce
short_description: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-In is a sulfate free conditioner that softens hair and improves styling manageability.
This leave-in conditioner is great to detangle, protect and control frizz. It leaves natural hair wrapped in a light coastal coconut breeze.
All SheaMoisture hair products including this leave in hair conditioner are sustainably produced and cruelty-free.
This SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-In, blended with Coconut Oil, Coconut Milk and Acacia Senegal, can be used as a daily conditioner.
Generously spray this daily conditioner on clean damp hair focusing on mid-lengths to ends of the hair. Blow or air-dry.
SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-In is formulated with no silicones, no sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no mineral oil or petrolatum.
product_description: SheaMoisture's 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Leave-In Conditioner, blended with 100% Virgin Coconut and Shea Oils, creamy Coconut Milk and Acacia Senegal, this conditioner protects and controls frizz for all hair types. Soften hair and improve styling manageability with this lightweight, milk leave-in treatment. It leaves hair wrapped in a light coastal coconut breeze. All SheaMoisture hair products including this leave in hair conditioner are sustainably produced and cruelty-free. This SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-In, blended with Coconut Oil, Coconut Milk and Acacia Senegal, can be used as a daily conditioner. Generously spray this daily conditioner on clean damp hair focusing on mid-lengths to ends of the hair. Blow or air-dry. SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-In is formulated with no silicones, no sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no mineral oil or petrolatum. It has been tested on family and friends and never on animals. Our Story: SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and entrepreneur who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. With every purchase you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities.

name: Aussie Hair Insurance Leave-In Conditioner Spray, Frizz Control, Softening with Jojoba & Sea Kelp, Moisturizing Treatment for All Hair Types, Juicy Citrus, 8 Fl Oz Each, Triple Pack
short_description: TRIPLE PACK: You will receive three 8 oz Leave In Conditioner Sprays
TAME FRIZZ & SOFTEN HAIR: This leave-in spray conditioner tames frizz and softens hair at first spritz
INFUSED WITH JOJOBA OIL: Formulated with hair-loving ingredients like jojoba oil
YUMMY SCENT: Your hair will smell like juicy citrus thanks to this lovely scent
HOW TO USE: Simply spray on damp hair and go--no need to rinse
CRUELTY-FREE: All Aussie products are certified PETA Cruelty-Free
product_description: This hydrating leave-in hair conditioner is the assurance your hair needs to look and feel its best. Aussie Hair Insurance instantly tames frizz and softens hair. It’ll leave your hair looking polished, feeling more manageable, and, of course, super soft and smooth. This hair mist can work as a leave-in conditioner for curly hair as well as any other hair type. Aussie loves jojoba oil for hair--that’s why it’s infused in this leave-in conditioner spray formula. The juicy citrus scent is a bonus. Plus, this leave-in hair conditioner is certified PETA Cruelty-Free. It's a cinch to use--simply spray on damp hair and go. Enjoy soft and conditioned hair--no need to rinse.

name: Renpure Biotin & Collagen Leave-In Conditioner Treatment, For a Fuller, Thicker Look That Shines, Biotin Hair Spray Leave In Conditioner For Fine, Thin or Limp Hair, Vitamin B7, Collagen - 8 Fl Oz
short_description: Renpure Biotin & Collagen Thickening Leave-In Conditioner Treatment is infused with Vitamin B7 (Biotin) and protein (Collagen); this leave in conditioner spray for fine hair helps give the appearance of fuller, thicker hair while nourishing

Our collagen and biotin leave in conditioner treatment is enriched with Vitamin B7 (Biotin) to reinforce structural integrity of hair shafts for a fuller look, and Collagen to promote strength and moisture retention, enhancing volume and density

Spray Renpure leave in conditioner evenly throughout damp hair; comb through to detangle, do not rinse out, and style as usual; use daily for best results and pair with Renpure Biotin & Collagen Shampoo and Conditioner to a fuller, denser look & feel
Our biotin spray treatment is naturally inspired, vegan and cruelty free and and free from Mineral Oil, Petrolatum, Sulfates, Parabens, Silicones or Gluten.

At Renpure, we believe that everyone deserves beautiful hair, without compromise; our lids and bottle are both 100% recyclable, making sustainable choices easier; after rinsing, drop the whole hair leave in treatment package into the recycling bin
product_description: Indulge in the luscious experience of Renpure Biotin & Collagen Thickening Leave-In Conditioner Treatment. Crafted with nutrient-rich Biotin and fortifying Collagen, this leave in hair conditioner treatment leaves fine hair feeling fuller, denser, and full of body. Formulated to nourish fine hair with lightweight conditioning, it ensures beautifully smooth and shiny hair. This hair thickening spray is great for volume enhancement and overall hair care.

short_description: HYDRATING & MOISTURIZING SPRAY: BioSilk Hydrating Therapy protects from frizz, adds shine & replenishes hair moisture by providing the rich, luxurious, and moisturizing effects of maracuja oil. Expect instant results like smooth and moisture rich locks.

BIOSILK HYDRATING THERAPY: Our Hydrating Therapy products drench severely moisture depleted & coarse hair in moisture, reconstruct damaged areas, reinforce hair’s strength to prevent damage from tools & revitalize hair for soft, supple, shiny results.
BIOSILK SHAMPOOS & CONDITIONERS: BioSilk has some of the most powerful and effective shampoos and conditioners. Whatever your style we have a shampoo and conditioner just for you.
HOW TO USE: Spray on hair and style as usual. Use daily for added protection.

BIOSILK: The quest for healthier hair is how BioSilk Silk Therapy emerged in 1986. The creation of the Original Silk Therapy treatment has led to the development of BioSilk Hair Color and a full range of hair products.
